title: ChronoSteer: Bridging Large Language Model and Time Series Foundation Model via Synthetic Data
details: C Wang, Q Qi, Z Rao, L Pan, J Wang, J Liao - arXiv preprint arXiv:2505.10083, 2025
abstract: Conventional forecasting methods rely on unimodal time series data, limiting their ability to exploit rich textual information. Recently, large language models (LLMs) and time series foundation models (TSFMs) have demonstrated powerful capability …
